participant_1.background:
I love playing with my pets when I'm not working.
I spend too much time playing with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
I'd rather wear my overalls and boots.
i wear nice clothes.
I immerse myself in the smell of my favorite soap to find solace.

participant_2.background:
I'm doing well at school, but I wish I was taller so I could reach the top shelf.
I enjoy a good debate with myself on my free time, perhaps over a glass of expensive wine.
i ride a unicycle.
I spent my last summer riding horses and learning more about music with friends who understand my passion.
I am from a place where rain is always welcome.

content.text: Hello there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
Glad to hear it! What have you been up to lately?
I've been working on school a lot, but I also spent some time riding horses and learning more about music with friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not very musical, but I love to ride horses.
Me too! They're such amazing creatures.
Yeah, they really are. I wish I could ride horses more often.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and have fun.
I might have to look into that. I'm always looking for new ways to have fun.
Well, if you do decide to start riding horses, let me know. I'd love to go riding with you sometime.
I definitely will! Thanks for the offer.
No problem! I'm always looking for new people to ride horses with.
Well, I'm glad I found you! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun riding horses together.
